root.name: Klaymen Gun Hockey
root.description: OverviewThis game is an odd sports game that was only released in the Country of Japan. While containing characters from Neverhood, inc It was not developed by them at all. Nor did it feature the lovable claymation style the Neverhood games had.GameplayThe game allowed you to choose one of the characters from the Neverhood. The game was a pong-like hockey-themed game in which the person would shoot a gun like cannon and attempt to get colored discs into your opponents goal by hitting them with a ball. The discs could also be directed into power-ups which could be used to help you win, or just to cause more chaos.Klaymen Vs. A green CreatureThe game did contain a story mode of sorts. It involved going from computer match to computer match combating against various characters.
